com.madrobot.di.json

Class JSONSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.madrobot.di.json.JSONSerializer

  • public class JSONSerializer
extends Object
    Utility class for json serializer , by using this utility you can convert predefined java object into valid json
    Author:
    n.ayyanar

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static JSONSerializer getInstance() 
      String serializer(Object objType)
      Serializes the objType into valid JSON format
      If there is an error while serializes, if possible it will try to ignore it, otherwise returns a null value.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static JSONSerializer getInstance()

      • serializer

        public String serializer(Object objType)
                  throws JSONException
        Serializes the objType into valid JSON format
        If there is an error while serializes, if possible it will try to ignore it, otherwise returns a null value.
        Parameters:
        objType - Java Object to write JSON to
        Returns:
        String valid json string
        Throws:
        JSONException
        See Also:
        serializer(JSONObject, Stack)
